issue.title: I can't see phone_3 in urban_qual

content.raw: `scan` was just to be used to iterate levels, as artifacts weren’t visible until the level was loaded.  This should be resolved in the recent update to the validation tool, which should be a bit more robust in that regard: [#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397)  It also eliminates the need to `scan` through the levels, so you can just use the `next` call \(or `move_to`\)
content.html: scan was just to be used to iterate levels, as artifacts weren’t visible until the level was loaded. This should be resolved in the recent update to the validation tool, which should be a bit more robust in that regard: #!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/397 It also eliminates the need to scan through the levels, so you can just use the next call (or move_to)
